participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Jake enjoys quiet moments and values deep connections with others.
participant_1.background: I'm a single guy living in a small apartment with my dog. I work at a restaurant as a waiter. I love to snuggle up with a good book and my cat, Oscar, on a rainy day. My wife just left me. I once went on a road trip with Oscar and we saw a lot of cool places.

participant_2.name: Howard
participant_2.personality: Passionate and wise, Howard has a love for performing and seeks to inspire others through his art.
participant_2.background: My biggest fear is not being able to perform my best on stage. I'm the oldest of three boys. My most valued possession is my health, because without it I cannot do the things that make me happy. I'm 5'10", but I feel like I'm taller than that because of my hair. I am a 70-year-old man.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
I love to read on rainy days.
Me too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I'm really into historical fiction lately.
Me too! I just finished reading "All the Light We Cannot See" by Anthony Doerr and it was amazing.
I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really moving story.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I like to go on road trips, play video games, and cook.
Road trips are so much fun! I love seeing new places.
Me too! I've been on a lot of road trips with my dog, Oscar.
What kind of dog is Oscar?
He's a golden retriever. He's the best dog ever.
Golden retrievers are so cute! I've always wanted one.
You should get one! They're the best dogs
